A per yole explanation, the DialogWrapper must be created only from event dispatch thread and it is an error to do otherwise. The previous code used locking, and caused deadlocks if new popup is shown from other thread while one dialog is active. This change fails with exception, if the code is invoked from other tread. So if you start receiving IllegalStateException, the current usage is incorrect, and should be transformed to EventQueue.invokeLater() or EventQueue.invokeAndWait()', 'RUBY-1809', 'switch to model accepts singularized model name (RUBY-1808)', 'Keys navigation', 'IDEADEV-11966 Offer to create CSS class in "Extract embedded CSS" dialog', 'refactoring: extract code for working with Inflector to a separate class', 'fix absolute paths on unix-like systems', 'test groups updated', 'Maven: groovy facet support Maven: IDEADEV-29916 fix Maven: test refactoring Groovy: groovy library detection adjusted', 'test for RUBY-1809', 'RAAE fix', 'fix names for customization', 'fix buttons validation', 'preserve output variables order', 'ExecutionConsoleEx introduced', "fix contexts 'jumping' while stepping", 'raw substitutor: cleanup', 'move "new directory" action to lang-impl (RUBY-1810)', 'IDEADEV-29897', 'RUBY-1701', 'optimize SvnRepositoryContentRevision.getFile() (IDEADEV-29955)', 'IDEADEV-27496 -
